description: This trail is a 7.7 kilometre loop with an optional 5.5 side trip (which is not shown in the GPS track.)  It takes you to the old Skymount fire tower location, and offers a spectacular lookout over Cache Lake. The interpretive guide outlines some interesting facts about the history of Algonquin Park. It is our new found favourite hiking trail in the Park!
directions: Located just off Highway 60 at km 25.
title: Track and Tower
